title: Google has OpenAI rattled. Why that’s a problem for Oracle and Microsoft.
description: Oracle and Microsoft have bet big on OpenAI but Google is shaking up the artificial-intelligence race.
content:
Google launched its Gemini 3 AI model last month and it made a splash, winning rave reviews from users and analysts and beating OpenAI’s latest GPT 5.1 on benchmarking tests.
OpenAI isn’t taking that lying down. The start-up has declared a “code red"... [2728 chars]

title: UPDATE 3-Anthropic plans an IPO as early as 2026, FT reports
description: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com , has hired the law firm Wilson Sonsini to prepare for an initial public offering that could take place as early as 2026, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday. Wilson Sonsini and Anthropic did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for a comment.

title: The AI frenzy is driving a memory chip supply crisis
description: An acute global shortage of memory chips is forcing artificial intelligence and consumer-electronics companies to fight for dwindling supplies, as prices soar for the unglamorous but essential components that allow devices to store data.

title: Data centre boom lifts economic growth to two-year high
description: Private investment surged at its fastest pace since 2021 as businesses poured money into data centres to support the burgeoning artificial intelligence boom.
content:
The economy continued its upward momentum in the September quarter, growing at the fastest annual rate in more than two years on the back of the investment boom in data centres and artificial intelligence as well as government spending.
Gross domesti... [298 chars]

title: Why SoftBank's Masayoshi Son ‘was crying’ about selling Nvidia shares, but did it anyway
description: SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son said he wouldn’t have sold off Nvidia Corp. shares if his company had unlimited money to bankroll its next investments in artificial intelligence, which include a big bet on OpenAI.
content:
Masayoshi Son, founder, chairman and CEO of SoftBank Group Corp. has claimed that he did want to sell stake in Nvidia, but needed the money to fund investments in OpenAI and other artificial intelligence projects.
Son, addressing for the first time t... [1679 chars]

title: Marvell Technology buys Celestial AI in $3.25 billion deal, shares jump nearly 8% - Inside the acquisition
description: The acquisition of Celestial AI is part of the company's strategy to capture more of the runaway spending on artificial intelligence computing. Marvell Technology shares jumped in extended trading.
content:
Marvell Technology is set to acquire artificial intelligence startup Celestial AI in a deal worth $3.25 billion, the chipmaker said on Tuesday.
The news came as Marvell announced its third quarter results for the current financial year, and gave bull... [405 chars]

title: Bank of England warns debt-fuelled AI spending boom could unravel
description: The Bank of England has issued a stark warning. A massive spending boom in artificial intelligence infrastructure, funded by debt, faces significant risks. Stretched stock market valuations are a major concern. A correction in AI stocks could impact wider debt markets. This situation is developing and could affect household wealth and borrowing costs.
content:
